translation.En: Currently, Hotel Villa Tournon is negotiating with the Instituto Costarricense de Turismo Certificate for Sustainable Tourism (CST). However, for years we have been identifying all environmental aspects of our activities to act on them. We have already made progress in methods of efficiency in energy and water consumption, waste separation, control chemical usage. In addition we have incorporated wing organization management and a series of methodology and procedure regarding a code of conduct involving shareholder, customer employees, suppliers, environment, society. This year we are committed to creating an alliance, establishing an agenda of appointments with our suppliers to find sustainable solutions to the environment; and share and discuss new ideas and eco-efficient initiatives.

No obstante, hace aÃ±os hemos venido identificando todos los aspectos ambientales de nuestras actividades para poder actuar sobre ellas. Ya hemos avanzado en mÃ©todos de eficiencia en el consumo de energÃ­a y agua, separaciÃ³n de residuos, control de uso de productos quÃ­micos. AdemÃ¡s hemos ido incorporando ala gestiÃ³n y organizaciÃ³n una serie de metodologÃ­a y procedimiento referente a un cÃ³digo de conducta que implica a accionista, empleados cliente, proveedores, medio ambiente, sociedad. Este aÃ±o tenemos el compromiso de la creaciÃ³n de una alianza, estableciendo una agenda de citas con nuestros proveedores para la bÃºsqueda de soluciones sostenibles con el medio ambiente; ademÃ¡s de compartir y debatir nuevas ideas e iniciativas eco eficientes.

translation.En: Places you can visit in walking distance:

Ebony and Ivory restaurant is a space recently designed in the hotel consisting of a modern and warm environment; where you can distinguish the decoration in black and white, in the ceilings, walls, furniture and tableware; additionally supplemented with arts including paintings, photographs and sculptures. The cuisine also shares this dichotomy. You will be able to enjoy a dish fusion regarding European food mainly Spanish, French, and Italian likewise in one sense, and on the other, the cuisine of the Caribbean countries. The Caribbean representing the concept of Ebony and the european of Ivory.
translation.Es: El Restaurante Ebony and Ivory es un espacio recientemente diseÃ±ado en el hotel que consta de un entorno moderno y cÃ¡lido; en la que se evidencia una decoraciÃ³n en blanco y negro, entre cielos, paredes, muebles y menaje; ademÃ¡s complementado con artes entre pinturas, fotografÃ­as y esculturas. La cocina es una fusiÃ³n de platos europeos, fundamentalmente de las cocinas espaÃ±ola, italiana y francesa, por una parte, por la otra, la culinaria de los paÃ­ses caribeÃ±os. La CaribeÃ±a en representaciÃ³n del concepto de Ebony y la europea a Ivory.

translation.En: The areas that our guest occupies and transits are created in the Villa Tournon Hotel are with the aim for our passengers to enjoy pleasant sensations and experiences that meet their needs. The decoration and atmosphere in the restaurant serves so that it generates pleasure. In it we strive to customize and gratify with our services your stay, create memorable moments that go beyond expectations. The dining area is decorated with embossed art work, tapestries with scenes recreating historic moments of the harvest of coffee in our country; watercolor paintings, oil paintings, beautiful stained glass windows and a brick fireplace are just some of the objects that you can admire and observe while you relish our national and international gastronomic specialties in which prevails the tender care and the notorious courtesy of the staff. This attention to guests is extended from 6 am until 10 pm. Social events are held in this area and it has a capacity for 150 people.
translation.Es: La decoraciÃ³n y ambientaciÃ³n en el restaurante se sirve en este espacio para que genere placer. En Ã©l nos esforzamos en personalizar y gratificar con nuestros servicios su estadÃ­a, crear memorables momentos que llegan mÃ¡s allÃ¡ de sus expectativas. El comedor estÃ¡ decorado con artes de obra en repujados, tapices con escenas que recrea momentos histÃ³ricos de la cosecha de cafÃ© en nuestro paÃ­s; pinturas en acuarela y en oleo; hermosos vitrales y una chimenea en ladrillos son algunos de los objetos que se pueden admirar y observar mientras se disgustan de nuestras especialidades gastronÃ³micas nacionales e internacional, en donde prevalece la amabilidad y la notoria cortesÃ­a del personal. Esta atenciÃ³n a los huÃ©spedes se prolonga desde las 6 am hasta las 10 pm. En esta Ã¡rea se celebran todo tipo de eventos sociales y tiene una capacidad para 150 personas.

translation.En: The business center has a capacity of up to 6 people, to organize business meetings, breakfast, presentations and video conferences, among others. Upon request, we provide for renting Video Beam.

translation.En: The hotel offers the possibility of holding various events with a differentiated service where premium attitude is displayed. There are two rooms enabled, The jungle and Rincon Azul, with capacity of 45 and 150 people respectively,they are enabled and equipped with materials and equipment needs, suitable for events such as conferences, seminars, weddings, baby showers, graduation party, lunches and private dinners; Likewise, enjoy our services of coffee break and the range of cuisine that we offer you in format menu, buffet or cocktail.
translation.Es: El hotel ofrece la posibilidad de celebrar distintos eventos con un servicio diferenciado donde prima la actitud. Hay dos salas habilitadas, La Jungla y RincÃ³n Azul, con capacidad de 45 y 150 personas respectivamente, estÃ¡n equipadas con materiales y equipos idÃ³neos segÃºn la actividad: para eventos como conferencias, bodas, seminarios, baby showers, fiesta de graduaciÃ³n, almuerzos y cenas privadas; asÃ­ mismo, puede disfruta de servicios de coffe break y la gama de gastronomÃ­a que le ofrecemos en formato de menÃº, buffet o coctel.

translation.En: Two sculpture pieces; one, a synonym of the lower body up to the waist of a woman, with a metamorphosis extension upward, in proportion in size to the related lower body. This piece was sculptured from a Guanacaste wood which is the national tree of Costa Rica; another is a sensory contemplation that can be held observing an African piece made out of Ebony wood. This work represents an African queen tenderly embracing two small children standing at her side. Rooms, passages and other areas are submitted to dozen of painting that make Hotel Villa Tournon a perfect gallery. This beauty is a key component to the experience added to your stay away from home
translation.Es: AsÃ­ mismo, se pueden subrayar dos piezas de escultura: uno, un sinÃ³nimo de la parte inferior de una mujer desde la cintura hacia abajo, con una extensiÃ³n de metamorfosis hacia arriba, en proporciÃ³n al tamaÃ±o de la parte inferior del cuerpo relacionado. EscrÃ­banos con confianza, estamos para servir

translation.En: I am Leslie Wilson Shimpson, General Manager of Hotel Villa Tournon, Costa Rican by birth. I started working in hospitality at the age of 21 in 1966 as a waiter.
translation.Es: Soy Leslie Wilson Shimpson, Gerente General del Hotel Villa Tournon, Costarricense de nacimiento. ComencÃ© a trabajar en hotelerÃ­a a la edad de 21 aÃ±os en 1966, como camarero.

translation.En: Job opportunities in Costa Rica was not easy then; Therefore I began to offer my services to work for free with the firm conviction that in time, the workplace would offer to pay me a salary; but the places I visited; I guess they had doubt my good faith.
translation.Es: Oportunidad de trabajo en Costa Rica no era fÃ¡cil entonces; por tal motivo empecÃ© a ofrecer mis servicios para trabajar gratuitamente con la firme convicciÃ³n de que en poco tiempo, el lugar de trabajo me ofrecerÃ­a pagar un salario; mas los lugares que visitÃ©; supongo que tuvieron duda de mi buena fe.

translation.En: In less than two years working as a waiter and in other post I got to the position of assistant manager of the hotel; months before completing four years of work in the company, my boss and I become partners in a new hotel. After two years I acquired his share and became the sole owner. During that period I had not completed high school.
translation.Es: En menos de dos aÃ±os trabajando como camarero y en otros puestos me escale al puesto de asistente del Gerente del hotel; meses antes de completar cuatro aÃ±os de trabajar en la empresa, mi jefe y yo nos convertimos en socios en un nuevo hotel. Transcurridos dos aÃ±os adquirÃ­ su participaciÃ³n y me convertÃ­ en el Ãºnico propietario. Durante ese perÃ­odo no habÃ­a completado la escuela secundaria.

translation.En: Today I am a lawyer and also went to journalism school.
translation.Es: En la actualidad soy abogado y tambiÃ©n fui a la escuela de periodismo.

translation.En: I founded Hotel Villa Tournon in 1992. Forty-nine years have gone by since I started to work in hospitality. I have a great passion for my job, I love dealing with people of all nationalities. My mission is to convey to a new generation of hospitality workers the satisfaction which can be experienced assisting strangers every day.
translation.Es: FundÃ© Hotel Villa Tournon en 1992. Cuarenta y nueve aÃ±os han transcurrido desde que empecÃ© a trabajar en hotelerÃ­a. Mi misiÃ³n es transmitir a una nueva generaciÃ³n en hospitalidad la satisfacciÃ³n que se experimenta apoyando a extraÃ±os todos los dÃ­as.
